articles.title: New Jersey tightens restrictions as COVID-19 surges across the United States
articles.description: New Jersey Governor Phil Murphy on Monday announced stricter capacity restrictions for both indoor and outdoor gatherings as more U.S. states took steps to combat the latest coronavirus surge.
articles.content: New Jersey Governor Phil Murphy on Monday announced stricter capacity restrictions for both indoor and outdoor gatherings as more U.S. states took steps to combat the latest coronavirus surge. Starting on Tuesday, a maximum of 10 people will be allow... [3157 chars]

articles.title: San Jose Sharks unveil new ‘reverse retro’ alternate jersey
articles.description: The San Jose Sharks will wear new alternate jerseys that take inspiration from the team's 1998 uniforms.
articles.content:
The San Jose Sharks joined the rest of the National Hockey League in unveiling a new alternate jersey Monday that will be worn next season.
The Sharks’ new “Reverse Retro ADIZERO Authentic jersey” from Adidas is part of the NHL’s first league-wide al... [1458 chars]

articles.title: NHL, adidas release Dallas Stars’ new all-white Reverse Retro uniforms
articles.description: Another new look for the Dallas Stars is coming in 2021. After debuting its “Blackout” jersey in October, Dallas picked up another new uniform on Monday...
articles.content:
Another new look for the Dallas Stars is coming in 2021.
After debuting its “Blackout” jersey in October, Dallas picked up another new uniform on Monday after adidas and the National Hockey League unveiled the Reverse Retro ADIZERO Authentic jerseys ... [1757 chars]

articles.title: Reverse Retro: NHL looks back for league's future with new jersey program
articles.description: TORONTO — Dan Near and his team at Adidas saw the numbers and were brainstorming about how to proceed. The NHL had just released a survey on fans' favourite all-time jersey designs, and 22 of the top-25 were either retro or now-defunct looks.
articles.content:
